colleges.admission_dates: Fall Semester: August 1 - September 15, Spring Semester: January 5 - February 15
events: Annual Cultural Fest - "Harmonious Melodies": Celebrate the diversity of talents through music, dance, and art every November.
Science & Technology Symposium: A week-long event where scholars present groundbreaking research and innovations.
colleges.research_history: Harmony University takes pride in its rich research legacy, producing Nobel laureates and contributing to major scientific advancements.
colleges.sports: Join our renowned sports teams and participate in various athletic events, including football, basketball, swimming, and more.

colleges.admission_dates: Spring Session: January 20 - March 15, Fall Session: August 10 - September 30
events: Annual Art Gala: An enchanting evening celebrating creativity and showcasing the exceptional artwork of our students and faculty.
Theater Festival - "Spotlight Nights": Witness mesmerizing theatrical performances by budding actors and directors.
colleges.research_history: Aurora Institute of Arts fosters innovative artistic research, nurturing talents that redefine the boundaries of creativity.
colleges.sports: Embracing athleticism and artistic expression, the institute offers unique sports like Parkour, Capoeira, and Yoga for students to explore.

colleges.admission_dates: Summer Intake: April 1 - May 31, Winter Intake: November 5 - December 15
events: HackZTI: An annual hackathon that challenges students to solve real-world problems using technology and creativity.
TechExpo: A showcase of cutting-edge projects and research conducted by students in various tech disciplines.
colleges.research_history: Zenith Tech is renowned for its groundbreaking research in computer science, engineering, and robotics, pushing the boundaries of technological advancement.
colleges.sports: Embrace the spirit of innovation on and off the field with Esports competitions, drone racing, and robotic competitions.

colleges.admission_dates: Fall Semester: July 20 - August 31, Spring Semester: January 10 - February 28
events: Marine Discovery Week: A hands-on exploration of marine life and ecosystems, engaging students in marine conservation efforts.
Sailing Regatta: Compete in thrilling sailing competitions and learn seamanship from seasoned sailors.
colleges.research_history: Marine Academy has a legacy of pioneering marine research, contributing to oceanography and marine conservation.
colleges.sports: Discover a love for water sports with activities like scuba diving, snorkeling, and kayaking.

colleges.admission_dates: Fall Intake: September 1 - October 31, Spring Intake: February 1 - March 31
events: Medical Symposium - "Healing Horizons": An event that brings together medical professionals to share knowledge and advancements.
Health and Wellness Fair: Promoting healthy lifestyles with free medical check-ups and fitness workshops.
colleges.research_history: Celestial Medical College excels in medical research, leading to breakthroughs in healthcare and medical treatments.
colleges.sports: Nurture a healthy mind and body with sports like tennis, swimming, and yoga to de-stress during your medical studies.

colleges.admission_dates: Summer Session: May 1 - June 30, Winter Session: December 1 - January 15
events: Entrepreneurship Summit: A platform for aspiring entrepreneurs to pitch ideas and learn from successful business leaders.
Financial Symposium: Understanding global markets and financial strategies from experts in the field.
colleges.research_history: Stellar Business School is renowned for its business research, shaping innovative strategies and thought leadership.
colleges.sports: Develop leadership skills with sports like team-building exercises, leadership retreats, and business case competitions.
